meanings.definition: The quality or state of being sottish
meanings.sent1: Her sottishnesses were evident when she stumbled and slurred her words.
meanings.sent2: The sottishnesses of the man were clear as he drank himself into a stupor.
meanings.sent3: Despite his sottishnesses, he managed to make everyone laugh with his silly jokes.
meanings.sent4: The sottishnesses of the situation were like a heavy fog clouding his judgment.
meanings.sent5: The sottishnesses of his behavior left a lasting impression on everyone.

meanings.definition: The behavior or characteristics of a sot
meanings.sent1: His sottishnesses included excessive drinking and reckless behavior.
meanings.sent2: The sottishnesses of the partygoers were evident in their loud and rowdy actions.
meanings.sent3: The sottishnesses of the cat knocking over the vase made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her sottishnesses were like a bright warning sign to those around her.
meanings.sent5: The sottishnesses of his friends led him down a path he never expected.
